```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
house.data <- fread(file = "./data/train.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

### Let's look at all the variables in the data set

```{r houses}

par(mfrow=c(2,2))
par(mar=rep(2,4))
i <- 2
for (i in 2:80){
  plot(select(house.data,i,81),col='steel blue',main = paste0(colnames(house.data)[i]," NAs: ",sum(is.na(select(house.data,i)))))
}
```
